name: MRE
description: A generic MRE box, you shouldn't see this.
A generic small MRE box, you shouldn't see this

name: MRE entree
description: A generic MRE entree, you shouldn't see this.

name: MRE - Accessory Pack
description: An MRE accessory pack containing a variety of utensils and drinks.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.

name: MRE - Dessert Pack
description: A sealed plastic bag containing an array of desserts.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.

name: MRE - Chili & Beans
description: A 'Meal Ready to Eat' with a chili & beans entree and everything a hungry soldier needs.  The contents will begin to rot once they're removed from this sealed bag.  Activate or disassemble it to get to its contents.

name: chili & beans entree
description: The chili & beans entree from an MRE.  Sterilized using radiation, so it's safe to eat.  Exposed to the atmosphere, it has started to go bad.
